title: What are the most impressive song lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve used this song before for this type of thing. Just think about the division and hatred in this country today. People don’t trust the police or the government, and the political parties seem to hate each other. We are still having terrible wars. Now jump back in time to 1969. Viet Nam was in full swing, people were losing faith in their elected leaders. In my opinion, the one song that literally nails the mood of the country then AND now, is Monster by Steppenwolf. If you decide to listen, the best version is the one below. The music is great and it’s even better when you know the lyrics.
